OCC: This post not moding, this is really how it happened.

Gangon walked i=
nto the Maximal base, seeing how that the autoguns weren't set to fire at h=
im. Gangon looked around. The memories came flooding back to him as he stoo=
d there in depair.

Gangon had just been built, by some force still unknown=
 to himself, and he waltzed into the room happily saying to Hell Beast that=
 he would kill the Maximals, he had no emotions what-so-ever, and was madly=
 loyal. Later on, gangon found a lab underground, and met Dracona. Gangon w=
as chased by Dracona, but he got away. Gangon soon found more Maximals to s=
lag, Dinobot and Tavatron. Gangon fired at Dinobot, looking for a quick kil=
l. But Dinobot was powerful, and Gangon was pinned to the ground. Dracona s=
howed up to kill all of them, Dracona was avoid of emotion as well. Suukie =
showed up and ran Dracona off, and as Gangon looked for a quick kill on Suu=
kie, Dinobot had hit him with a sucker punch. gangon crawled away, crawlein=
g away was something that was natural to him, as he had some run-ins with S=
inesis and other bots, all ending in him crawling away injured. Gangon fina=
lly found that another bot had been defeated by the Maximals, due to outnum=
bering, her name...was BrightBlade. gangon had snuck up behind her, and ask=
ed her of her faction. BrightBlade replied with "Neither, I just got here."=
 Gangon had given her a speach why she should join Hell Beast, and then he =
had rudely ran away, not knowing much about anything then. BrightBlade was =
so mad she stood there for days, as she had told Gangon. BrightBlade finall=
y joined Hell Beast's Predacons, and it was the best thing to ever happen t=
o Gangon in his life. Gangon was asigned to be BrightBlade's partner, and t=
hey had alot of fun together. First they fought in a big battle, where Gang=
on tried to mimic BrightBlade's hotwire move on a gun, and made a big explo=
sion instead.Gangon had said some sweet words to BrightBlade, and he slowly=
 fell in love with her. Gangon and BrightBlade hung out together and relaxe=
d in the fields, and eventually, Lightmare showed up. She tried to win the =
affections of gangon, and even BrightBlade was convinced that Gangon no lon=
ger liked her. Gangon rejected Lightmare as nice as he could, saying that h=
e loved BrightBlade. Lightmare still would not hang around and she left. Br=
ightBlade was promoted to second in command, Gangon wasn't even promoted ab=
ove soldier. Gangon was not jealous though, but eventually, BrightBlade got=
 too far away from him, and Gangon wasn't invited on many missions. Gangon =
eventually could not even contact BrightBlade on the commlink, and now he f=
elt that his life, was over. Gangon walked to the Maximal base, hoping some=
one would kill him, but nobody did anything to him, they just ignored him. =
And that's where he was now.

Gangon walked back outside the Maximal base, =
crying a puddle outside, that ar surpassed Plintissa's puddle of tears on t=
he inside. Gangon walked over a hill, hoping that the Matrix would show mer=
cy on him in the end...
